bibl.title: The Writing Tablets and Papyrus from Tomb II in Daphni 1.
bibl.note: A preliminary version of this paper was published as: Egert Pöhlmann & Martin L. West, The Oldest Greek Papyrus and Writing Tablets: Fifth-Century Documents from the 'Tomb of the Musician' in Attica, ZPE 180 (2012) pp. 1-16, 6 pll. - The Writing Tablets. - The Papyrus. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Martin L. West, The Writing Tablets and Papyrus from Tomb II in Daphni 1.
Greek and Roman Musical Studies 1 (2013) pp. 73-92, 1 fig., 7 pll. n./bl. et coul.

A preliminary version of this paper was published as: Egert Pöhlmann & Martin L. West, The Oldest Greek Papyrus and Writing Tablets: Fifth-Century Documents from the 'Tomb of the Musician' in Attica, ZPE 180 (2012) pp. 1-16, 6 pll. - The Writing Tablets. - The Papyrus. - Conclusion.
